html:
2.10.22  9:07 am   what's your favourite section of billwurtz.com

      questions

2.10.22  7:12 am   does your next song contain a cat? 

      no

2.10.22  2:19 am   how come, even if i enjoy making music while i'm making it, i always procrastinate working on songs? shouldn't i be using songwriting to procrastinate, not procrastinating songwriting itself

      i suspect there might be some fear and pressure developing, because it means so much to you. you might be afraid of screwing it up

2.10.22  1:07 am   what do you consider the genre of music you make,

     regular

     is it jazz or something else?

     it's certainly not jazz

2.10.22  12:48 am   I know this has been asked before, but what is you favorite video you've ever made

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

     and why

     it's me who makes them, so, in contrast to the 'viewer' experience where you wanna focus on the items that already exist, it's my job to focus on the future ones that don't exist yet. that's the whole way they get made

2.10.22  12:12 am   nihilism?

      tryhilism

2.9.22  11:20 pm   what do you do when you don't know what to do?

      sing about it

2.9.22  10:37 pm   man recently a youtuber i watch mentioned that in like, all of zedds song, he uses a clock sample, and now i notice it every time "stay" or "the middle" play, and it doesnt annoy me or anything, i think its pretty cool, but i just want you to notice it too

      yes i've already noticed that

2.9.22  9:00 pm   do you enjoy integers

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.9.22  8:51 pm   How did you write (the verses of) "more than a dream" in 7/4 without it sounding like it skips a beat? 

      the skipped beat is earlier in the bar. at that point, it probably sounded like 3, which doesn't so much sound like a skip. then after that, it's 4, which sounds normal

2.9.22  7:41 pm   if you finish the music before finishing the video then what are you doing in front of the camera

      making the video

2.9.22  5:17 pm   how to spell handkercheif

      i couldn't even begin to imagine

2.9.22  4:29 pm   Is the fact that one's opinion on most things is completely meaningless hopeful or fearful in nature?

      it depends whether the fact that 1=2 is good or bad

2.9.22  3:33 pm   whats your favorite song you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.9.22  3:06 pm   hi bill, when you're making a song, how many times do you reckon you sing a line before thinking of the next line? by the way, you're amazing, ok bye

      for each run-through of what i already have, it becomes less likely to get a result. So the most likely time to get a result is the first time. if that doesn't happen, then it becomes less and less likely to get something, the more times you try. So when you get stuck, you keep getting more stuck. but when you're not stuck, things can move forward very very quickly, pretty much in real-time

2.9.22  2:23 pm   is it possible to compose without an instrument?

     yes

     where would i start if i were to write music without touching an instrument? in this case how would i "play around" and experiment? 

     i think it just depends how much experience you have with music. Compare it to your level of experience with speaking and writing english, which i assume you've been doing for a long time. I'm sure you could compose several paragraphs of words, without speaking. What's most helpful in this situation is the ability to write it down somehow, and a reliable writing system which you are comfortable with

2.9.22  2:09 pm   Do your songs reflect what you feel in that moment?

     often

     (like when you wrote "might quit" were you actually thinking of quitting)

     the part of that song that says "i think i might quit" is in reference to quitting school (mentioned immediately before). i was not in school, so that line is not factually correct for me, but the reason that line is there (it's the first line) is probably to inject a jolt of energy into the beginning of the song, and then go from there

2.9.22  1:41 pm   opinions on corn?

      it's like a lego set that you can only take apart

2.9.22  1:28 pm   how to make toast

      toast can only be made from 7 other pieces of toast, arranged in a sacred formation. the first piece of toast is believed to have been found high atop mount toast

2.9.22  1:09 pm   Why would you prefer to make a new song to be your favorite?

      if i continue to do this, then over time i'd accumulate a lot of favorable songs

2.9.22  12:26 pm   daily trivia: what can form under pressure and break without it?

      willpower

2.9.22  11:25 am   do you sometimes produce music weeks, months if not years before actually posting it onto a platform like youtube?

      sometimes but usually not

2.9.22  11:13 am   how does music sound so good? what's the secret?

      it all comes down to that moment when you fully believe there's actually a person under there

2.9.22  10:54 am   How do you draw?

      try just putting a dot on the page. the magic of this is that you get to choose any place, don't forget about some of the corners and non-corners

2.9.22  10:24 am   I'm a bluebird, I'm a bluebird, I'm a bluebird, yeah, yeah, yeah

      fair enough

2.9.22  9:58 am   did you notice how time is moving slower these days?

      no. that's because the noticing is bound to time itself

2.9.22  9:55 am   why does everybody hate everything 

      ah, you must be looking through some kind of filter

2.9.22  9:16 am   Will you ever give a commencement speech at a university someday? If so, where are you thinking of? 

      i'd rather do them on a regular basis and get really good at it. the problem with commencement speeches is like the same problem with ted talks. it's something the person usually doesn't do very often, so they always seem nervous. but if they were doing it once a week they'd be awesome after a while

2.9.22  8:42 am   what's the deal with 'cleanliness'

      it's the opposite of 'cleanlinesslessness'

2.9.22  5:20 am   how do i tell that when a clock is on a wall its telling the time all wrong?

      make an appointment with someone, and then go to the appointment according to the time on the clock. and see if the other person is there

2.9.22  3:34 am   English name recommendations?

      obedience

2.9.22  3:32 am   I ask you questions on here from time to time and I always try to make the question unique or novel in some way. But I've realized now after skimming through years of answered questions that it's pretty likely that every question or comment you receive has already been sent before.

     that's generally tends to be true

      This question page is almost like a microcosm of how nearly everything in the world has already been thought up or dreamed of before, just because of sheer numbers and probability.

     of course everything in the world has been thought of. but what about everything that's not yet in the world? there's way more of that, and none of it's been thought of

     And it hit me that even this observation has likely already been made to you before - I bet even this question isn't unique, and the meta narrative I'm writing now has all been done before as well. So now I have to ask: have you received a question and observation like this before?

     there seem to be 2 themes in this question ('all questions have been asked before', and 'everything in the world has been done / thought of before'). those are both common themes, which i have received both separately and together

2.9.22  12:07 am   any recommendations for a fun story to write about?

      getting from point A to B

2.8.22  9:51 pm   I accidentally got ink on my mobile phone's touch screen. How do you recommend removing the ink? 

      remove the screen instead. leave the ink there

      smoot

2.8.22  8:19 pm   Will the next video have live performance footage?

      yes

2.8.22  8:00 pm   why are B and C only half a step apart

      this is part of a scheme to place pleasant harmony (and melody) conveniently in your hands

2.8.22  7:23 pm   when did you decide to start making songs that are over 6-40 seconds long

      when i was very young

2.8.22  7:06 pm   Do you know where the door is?

      it's me, i'm the door

2.8.22  6:33 pm   how to choose one of infinity things

      choose the first one

     they're wrong

     narrow. contains only the home row

     does your next song have lyrics that contain the letter x?

     just 1

      how are you?

      pretty good

      start by tallying up the items in your household

2.8.22  3:17 pm   have i suffered enough.

      any amount is enough. if you do more, that will be enough also

2.8.22  2:41 pm   How's the farm doing? 

      it's a non-farm, but it's pretty good

2.8.22  2:16 pm   why do you use lowercase

      it's so deliciously normal

2.8.22  1:55 pm   what do you think happens to people after we die?

      i suppose your schedule opens right up

2.8.22  12:50 pm   do you consider yourself a pop artist?

      yes, i handed in the paperwork just the other day

2.8.22  12:37 pm   do you have a pet peeve?

      i prefer not to keep peeves as pets. i believe peeves should run wild, and free

2.8.22  12:14 pm   how to be mentally stable

      instead of putting all your ducks in a row, put them vertically, in a stack

2.8.22  11:54 am   what's a hot new rule and/or regulation that youve discovered recently 

      september and december have the same week/date alignment
